synopsis.text: Company's tropical island branch. Mint, along with her friend Thomas Dou and rival Noah, stumbles upon a dire issue that poses a significant threat to the Santa Company and the surrounding wildlife - ocean pollution! As Mint struggles to come out of her brother's shadow and prove herself as a capable tonttu, she might just find the opportunity to save the day and ensure a merry Christmas for all. Dive into this unique and heartwarming Christmas tale, brought to life by Kenji Itoso, and witness how small acts of carelessness can pile up into a big problem, and how one clumsy elf can make a world of difference.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
